item.title: GStreamer 101 at GNOME Asia 2011
item.description: My GStreamer 101 presentation at GNOME.asia was very wel received. I was quite happy with the way it turned out. Thanks to Ford_Prefect and Bharath Acharya for pulling me in :) My very minimal slides are here. You can reuse them if you want to. Sadly, missed the week long hackfest :( Next time!
